title: Apple celebrates Lunar New Year with limited edition Year of the Snake AirPods 4
description: Apple celebrates the Lunar/Chinese New Year with the release of a special edition of AirPods every year. Continuing that tradition, Apple has released the limited edition Year of the Snake AirPods 4 to celebrate the Year of the Snake, which begins on January 29, 2025. The limited AirPods 4 share the design and features with the regular model but sport a Snake-themed artwork on their charging case and the retail box. Apple AirPods 4 Year of the Snake Limited Edition These Year of the Snake AirPods 4 are available through Apple's retail stores and official website in Hong Kong,...
excerpt: They are up for sale in select countries through Apple's official stores. Apple celebrates the Lunar/Chinese New Year with the release of a special edition...
text: Apple celebrates the Lunar/Chinese New Year with the release of a special edition of AirPods every year. Continuing that tradition, Apple has released the limited edition Year of the Snake AirPods 4 to celebrate the Year of the Snake, which begins on January 29, 2025. The limited AirPods 4 share the design and features with the regular model but sport a Snake-themed artwork on their charging case and the retail box. Apple AirPods 4 Year of the Snake Limited Edition These Year of the Snake AirPods 4 are available through Apple's retail stores and official website in Hong Kong, China, Taiwan, and Singapore for HKD1,499, CNY1,399, TWD5,990, and SGD249, respectively.
html:
Apple celebrates the Lunar/Chinese New Year with the release of a special edition of AirPods every year. Continuing that tradition, Apple has released the limited edition Year of the Snake AirPods 4 to celebrate the Year of the Snake, which begins on January 29, 2025.

The limited AirPods 4 share the design and features with the regular model but sport a Snake-themed artwork on their charging case and the retail box.


Apple AirPods 4 Year of the Snake Limited Edition

These Year of the Snake AirPods 4 are available through Apple's retail stores and official website in Hong Kong, China, Taiwan, and Singapore for HKD1,499, CNY1,399, TWD5,990, and SGD249, respectively.
